user.description: Enter the data to connect to the MIR meter via Bluetooth.

data_description.name: Compile the name of the meter from the model and serial number of the device. For example, C05-12345678901234
data_description.pin: The PIN code can be found in the meter's documentation.

pin.description: Enter the data to connect to the MIR meter via Bluetooth.

data_description.pin: The PIN code can be found in the meter's documentation.

error.no_device_found: Could not find meter bluetooth device
error.invalid_auth: Invalid PIN code or there is no connection with the meter
